God of WisdomAnswered on 22 Apr 2019SSBs have limits plus you may not get all the allocation you want.There could be a distrust in the government, lack of understanding of a bond, lack of education and sales people selling SSBs as compared to FDs whenever they step in a bank, etc.0 comments0
